grabbing her wrists in midair. Her body hangs, dangling against the side of the house. begins to lift her, pulling her back onto the balcony. Sure enough, something is on the windshield outside, blocking her sight.  Gale hits the wi BLOOD SMEARS across the glass, it drips down from above. in the middle of the road, drenched in blood, very much r a young Sissy Spacek. Gale swerves to miss her, but she turns too sharp and the veers off the road at top speed...flipping over on its si sliding off into the thick foliage.

Don't listen to him. It's him. He's the one. Sidney has lost it, she doesn't know who to trust.  She a gun at Stu..then Randy..then Stu...
Come on, Sid. Give me the gun.
No, Sid. They both move toward her.  There's no time.  She must ac Finally...
Fuck you both. And with that, Sidney steps back into the house and SLAMS front door shut.

(at the door)

emerging from the shadows, stumbling down the stairs.  Ve alive.

Help me...

"We all go a little mad sometimes." Randy squints, confused, as Billy aims the gun at Randy a the trigger.  The BLAST throws Randy's body against the w before sliding to a heap on the floor...still.

Anthony Perkins--PSYCHO BILLY TURNS TO SIDNEY... Who stands only feet away, face aghast... Fuck, no...this can't be happening.  Billy's eyes are on unmoving. He sticks his tongue out and slowly licks the blood dried face...tasting it.

Corn syrup. Same stuff they used for pig's blood in CARRIE. Sidney is dumbfounded.  Slowly, she takes a step back, mo the dark refines of the kitchen. His express pure evil. She takes another step back, shrinking into the dark kitc THE CAMERA TAKES A MOMENT TO ADJUST TO THE DARKNESS as th of a FIGURE appears... STANDING RIGHT BEHIND SIDNEY. text: If for no other reason than to put space between her and them...they stand in the entryway, trapping her in.
Where ya going? It's not over yet. We've got one more surprise--Stu, I believe it's your turn.
Oh yeah Stu disappears into the kitchen.

(to Sidney) What's wrong? You look like you've seen a ghost. Sidney stands, trying hard to hold a calm resolve. A NOISE comes from the kitchen.  A low dragging sound.  S reappears from the front hall...wrestling with something...someone... CLOSE ON STU...he has a body in tow, he thrusts it forwar rolls into the living room.  Sidney looks down to find...
bound and gagged.  His eyes wide in fear, very much alive
Daddy! She starts for him.
Close enough. Stu places the cellular phone in Mr. Prescott's shirt poc

Why are you doing this?
It's all part of the game.
It's called GUESS HOW I'M GOING TO DIE!
Fuck you.
We already played that game. You lost, remember?
You have to play, Sid. Don't want to disappoint your dad. He's been waiting around all night.
It's an easy game. We ask you a question. If you get it wrong--you die.
And if you get it right--you die.
You're crazy--both of you.
The official term is "psychotic".
You'll never get away with this.
Tell that to Cotton Weary. You wouldn't believe how easy it was to frame him.

Yeah, we just watched a few movies. Took a few notes. It was fun. Billy and Stu relish their madness, proud of themselves. Sidney looks to her dad, sees the tears in his eyes.  She back to Billy, unflinching..a determined look on her face
Why did you kill my mother?
Why? WHY? Did you hear that, Stu? I think she wants a motive. Hmmm...I don't really believe in motives, Sid. I mean, did Norman Bates have a motive? Stu plays along, shaking his head.
Nope.
And did they really ever explain why Hannibal Lecter liked to eat people? Don't think so. You see, it's scarier when there's no motive, Sid.
(fighting tears) I don't understand...
We did your mom a favor, Sid. The woman was a slut bag whore who flashed her shit all over town like she was Sharon Stone or something.
(laughing) ..so we put her out of her misery. I mean, let's face it, your mom was no Sharon Stone. Stu cracks up over this while Billy turns very serious.

Is that motive enough for you? Or how about this? Did you know your slut mother was sleeping with my dad and she's the reason my mom moved out and deserted me. A sudden silence.  Sidney is rigid with shock, his words with truth.
What? Even Stu is surprised with his seriousness.

Think about it. On the off chance I get caught-a motive like that could divide a jury for years, don't you think?. You took my mother, so I took yours. Big sympathy factor. Maternal abandonment causes serious deviant behavior. It certainly fucked you up. It made you have sex with a psychopath.
That's right and now that you're no longer a virgin. You gotta die--those are the rules. Billy sits the gun down on the table near the foyer.  And moves to Sidney with the butcher knife in hand.
Pretend this is all just a scary movie, Sid. How do you think it's going to end? Sidney doesn't respond.
(excited) This is the best part, Sid. Billy's got it all figured out. Why do you think we kept your father alive so long? Why did we save you for last?
You know what time it is, Sid? It's after midnight. It's your mother's anniversary. We killed her exactly one year ago today. Billy turns to Stu with the knife.  They eye each other.
Ready?
Yeah... Billy pulls the knife back and brings it forward quickly, into Stu.  He stumbles to ho his knees, WINCING in pain.
Jesus... Sidney SCREAMS...as blood gushes..real blood, a dark, dee Stu inspects the wound to his side...then he smiles...
Good one. My turn. He takes the knife from Billy.
Don't forget-stay to the side and don't go too deep. Stu stabs at Billy's belly, puncturing him...Billy double
Jesus...fuck, that hurt.
Stop it!
(squelching the pain) Got the ending figured out yet? Time's running out.
Come on, Sid. Think about it. Your father is the chief suspect. We cloned his cellular. The evidence is there. Billy takes the knife and slashes at Stu's arm, two quick cuts...he doubles over...
What if your father snapped? Your mom's anniversary set him off and he went on a murder spree, killing everyone...
(in major pain) Except for me and Billy...we were left for dead...
And then he killed you and then shoots himself in the head. It's a perfect ending.
Everyone dies but us. We get to carry on and plan the sequel. Let's face it, these days--you gotta have a sequel. Stu takes the knife and cuts at Billy.
You sick fucks--you've seen one too many movies. Billy looks at her, bent over, crazed.
Oh Sid, don't blame the movies...Movies don't create psychos. Movies just make psychos more creative. Stu staggers a bit.
That's it, Billy. I can't take any more. I'm feeling woozy.
Get the gun. I'll untie Pops. Billy moves to Sidney's father.
Where'd you put it? Stu is searching the foyer for the gun.
It's on the table.
No, it's not. Billy hobbles over.  The gun is gone.
Where the fuck is it?
(off camera) Right here, asshole. Billy and Stu look up in unison to see...
standing in the front door way, gun in hand.  Her body ta and bloody.  Her hair a mess.

I like that ending. Billy lunges at Gale, but she holds steady.  Billy and St each other.

I don't know Billy but I'm hurtin'.
Where the fuck did she go? Suddenly, the phone RINGS.  Billy and Stu look at each ot Completely surprised.  Billy scrambles over to the phone.
(picking up phone) Hello?
(from phone) Are you alone in the house? Billy looks to Mr. Prescott.  The cellular phone is gone.
You bitch--where the fuck are you?
Not so fast.  We're gonna play a little game. It's called GUESS WHO JUST
Billy looks around the living room.
Find her. Billy is fuming now...slightly staggering...and starting it.  He SCREAMS at Stu who has fallen to his knees.
I can't...I'm bad off, Billy. You cut to deep. Billy throws the phone at Stu.  He mouths to him, so Sid hear.  "Talk to her..."  Then Billy takes off for the kit Stu takes the phone.
(aware) So Stu, what's your motive? Billy's got one. The police are on their way. What are you going to tell them?
Peer pressure...I'm way to sensitive. Billy flies back in the room, grabbing the phone from Stu completely nuts now, staggering, bleeding, totally insane
(SCREAMING in phone) I'm gonna rip you up bitch. Just like your slut whore mother.

Gotta find me first, you pansy-assed Mama's boy. Billy starts ripping the room up, overturning furniture i fit of rage...when he notices the hall closet.  Touche! deliriously, heading for it, ripping it open as... A GHOST MASKED FIGURE strikes from within, with an umbrel sharp end hitting him in the chest as it fans out.  Billy back, stunned, as the GHOST comes at him again...the umbr lodges in his chest, and he goes down. Sidney rips the GHOST MASK off her head.  She looks at Bi disgusted, throwing the mask on Billy's now still body. movement behind her sends her reeling around to find... RANDY slowly sitting up.  His body drenched in blood.  He alive...barely.  He looks to Sidney...through pain...

His hands find the top of the TV...the VCR...he yanks on gripping it with his hands, bringing it around with force the VCR into Stu's head.  Stu drops. Her other hand brings the gun u face...but he head bunts it out the front door...suddenly of silver appears above Sidney. Billy has grasped the butcher knife...he rises it high ab Sidney ready to strike...when a bullet RIPS THROUGH THE F striking Billy knocking him back into the living room. Sidney looks up to see... GALE WEATHERS, holding the gun in a death grip as smoke r above the gun's chamber. Sidney sits up as Gale moves to her, helping her.  Their meet.  A life truce.

Sid, you found me out...I'm a virgin. And pretty happy about it right now. Sidney nudges their bodies.  They both stir.
Careful. This is the moment when you think the killer's dead, but then he springs back to life for one last scare. Sidney grabs the gun from Gale.
Not this time. She positions her foot on Stu's chest and aims.

This is for my Mom, asshole. She SHOOTS him in the forehead, a clean and perfect shot. aims the barrel at Billy who's eyes suddenly open, blinki her, blood bubbling from his lips.  He's not yet dead.  T lock.

And this Billy stud-bucket is for having an incredibly small weenie. She FIRES another perfect shot.  They're both goners. Sidney drops the smoking gun, standing silent over the bo quiet moment when suddenly...
Both Sid and Gale and Randy SCREAM in epic, final scare proportions as Mr. Prescott leaps forward, still bound an Sid catches her breath, relaxing.
Oh Daddy... She rushes to him, untying him...while Gale moves to the and retrieves the hidden camera.
I wanna close-up. Randy appears by Sidney's side, helping her untie her fat
This is probably an inappropriate moment, but you think you'd want to maybe go out with me sometime... like on a date? Sidney looks at him, dumbfounded.
Maybe catch a movie? A long moment as Sidney's face goes from disbelief to res to the slight trace of a smile.
Only if it's a nice Meg Ryan movie.
You got it. He smiles at her...watching as Sidney grabs hold of her f holding him tight as Gale Weathers, with camera in hand, hell of an ending to this SCARY MOVIE.
